title: ZOOM Cloud Meetings
description:
Stay connected wherever you go – start or join a 100-person meeting with crystal-clear, face-to-face video, high quality screen sharing, and instant messaging – for free! 

Award winning Zoom brings video conferencing, online meetings and group messaging into one easy-to-use application. 

Zoom is used by over 500,000 customer organizations and is #1 in customer satisfaction. 
It's super easy: install the free Zoom app, click on "Host a Meeting" and invite up to 100 people to join!

★ KEY FEATURES ★
✔Best Android video meeting quality 
✔Best Android screen sharing quality 
✔Screen share directly from your Android device
✔Screen share photos, web and Google Drive, Dropbox or Box files
✔Send group text, images and audio from mobile and desktop
✔Contact availability status
✔Easily invite phone, email or company contacts
✔Join as interactive participant or view-only webinar attendee
✔Works over WiFi, 4G/LTE and 3G networks
✔Safe driving mode while on the road
✔Connect with anyone on Android, other mobile devices, Windows, Mac, iOS, ZoomPresence, H.323/SIP room systems, and telephones

Join any meeting and host unlimited 1:1 meetings for free. Free group meetings are limited to 40 minutes.

Follow us:
Twitter https://twitter.com/zoom_us
LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/company/zoom-video-communications-inc-
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/zoomwithus

Have a question? Contact us at support@zoom.us

summary: Zoom is a free HD meeting app with video and screen sharing for up to 100 people
recentChanges:
Meeting features:
-Mute original audio with language interpretation
Resolved Issues
-Minor Bug Fixes
comments: Excellent overall. Two comments for improvement. 1. In areas of intermittent poor reception, zoom has trouble reconnecting, and under such circumstances it should prioritise sound, at low bit rate, and increase quality as signal improves and then add video. 2. When connecting via Bluetooth in my car, the sound seems to get channeled via the "telephone" function of the car radio, and not the Bluetooth audio. This is a poorer quality sound output.

I was never a fan of anything video until introduced to zoom. It's not only one of the leading video conference apps available but in my opinion, one of the best. More importantly, it's extremely user friendly and designed for ALL types of professional business savey people and businesses and students. The updates are amazing and developed in a way to allow Zoom to go as far as someone takes it. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a great, well rounded & super fun video chat experience!☆

I've used Zoom for a business network group spread across the US & Canada and it has allowed us to meet and discuss issues weekly. ... Almost like having a face to face. Being able to share screens and computer program info was especially helpful. I've also used it for personal conversations with friends and family. Rather fun to introduce them to this technology. Simple and intuitive to use.
Most reliable and complete conference call app. Been using this for years and it never fails me. Battery & data consumption is quite high
You could use a better UI on PC, especially on Mac/Linux. Other than that, probably the most enjoyable video conference tool Ive I've ever used.
